content: I completely agree with you. it is essential that infrastructure developments in kachin state prioritize improving access to education and healthcare, as these are critical to the long-term well-being of local communities. in addition to infrastructure developments, it is also important that governments and other organizations work to improve the overall quality of healthcare and education services, including the availability of trained healthcare workers, the provision of medical equipment and supplies, and the development of curriculums that meet the needs and interests of local communities. ultimately, sustained and well-targeted investments in education and healthcare infrastructure in kachin state would have a positive and lasting impact on the social and economic development of the region.
